title: Power of UK and China Legislatures

content.question: Which of the following statements about one of six countries studied in the AP Comparative Government and Politics course is true?

choices.label: While there are no effective checks on presidential power in Iran, the Mexican legislature has effective checks on the president.
Over the past decade, both the Russian and Chinese presidents have increased the power of the legislature.
The British legislature regularly seeks to hold the executive accountable, while the Chinese legislature does not serve as a regular check on executive power.
The Nigerian and Russian legislatures both act as effective checks on presidential power.

content.answer: The British legislature regularly seeks to hold the executive accountable, while the Chinese legislature does not serve as a regular check on executive power.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
